thread.title: Rocket League Patch 1.07 Available Now, Details Included
thread.title_full: Rocket League Patch 1.07 Available Now, Details Included

author: Steve_OS
title: Rocket League Patch 1.07 Available Now, Details Included
text: Rocket League Patch 1.07 Available Now, Details Included 04:48 PM - October 19, 2015 by Steve_OS Rocket League patch 1.07 is available now for PlayStation 4 and PC users with adjusted rank point calculations, improved ranked post-game UI stability when attempting to chat, and the ball indicator now properly appears in Beckwith Park (Stormy) . Check out the full details below. CHANGES AND UPDATES Online When a players Rank Points (RP) are well below average for their hidden matchmaking rating (MMR), bonus RP will be awarded for wins to better trend players towards their expected rank. UI/ UX Improved UI functionality in post-game Ranked matches when receiving unlocks or attempting to chat BUG FIXES Arenas Fixed an issue where the ball indicator would not appear in Beckwith Park (Stormy) when Render Detail was set below High Quality
